Detailed Description

Class provides helpers for multiple input windget.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , $EntityName.'_input' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->Settings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              
                              $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( $FilePath , $EntityName.'_input.tpl' );
                              
                              $Template = $this->common_replacements( $Template );

                              $Str = str_replace( 
                                    '{'.$EntityName."_input:$MacroParameters}" , $Template , $Str
                              );
                              
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( $Str );

Definition at line 484 of file multiple_input.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Limitations = array( 'value' => TERMINAL_VALUE , 'visible_value' => TERMINAL_VALUE );
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( 
                                                                        $Str , $EntityName.'_input_field' , $Limitations ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->Settings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );

                              $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( $FilePath , $EntityName.'_input_field.tpl' );

                              if( $this->Settings->get_setting( 'set_dialog' , false ) && 
                                    $this->Settings->get_setting( 'set_dialog' ) != false )
                              {
                                    $Template = str_replace( 
                                          '{set_dialog}' , 
                                          ' onclick="ultimix.OpenDialog( \'#'.$this->Settings->get_setting( 'dialog_id' ).
                                                '\' , \'#{id}\' , \'#visible_{id}\' , \'#'.$this->Settings->get_setting( 'dialog_id' ).
                                                '_data\' );"' , 
                                          $Template
                                    );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    if( $this->Settings->get_setting( 'dialog_id' , false ) )
                                    {
                                          $Template .= '{add_opener:selector=#'.$this->Settings->get_setting( 'dialog_id' ).
                                                ';opener=#visible_{id}}';
                                    }
                              }

                              $Template = $this->common_replacements( $Template );

                              $Str = str_replace( '{'.$EntityName."_input_field:$MacroParameters}" , $Template , $Str );

                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( $Str );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

multiple_input ( $  FilePath,
$  EntityName,
$  Str,
&$  Changed 
)

Function compiles forms and controls.

Parameters:
$FilePath - Path to the package.
$EntityName - Name of the entity.
$Str - Processing string.
$Changed - true if any of the page's elements was compiled.
Returns:
HTML code to display.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 565 of file multiple_input.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        for( ; $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( 
                                                                                          $Str , 'multiple_'.$EntityName.'_input' ) ; )
                        {
                              $this->Settings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              
                              $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( $FilePath , $EntityName.'_input.tpl' );
                              
                              $id = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'id' , md5( microtime( true ) ) );
                              $Template = str_replace( '{id}' , $id , $Template );
                              
                              $Name = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'name' , $EntityName );
                              $Values = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'value' , false );
                              $Template = str_replace( '{name}' , $Name.'[]' , $Template );
                              
                              if( $Values !== false )
                              {
                                    $Values = unserialize( $this->Security->get( $Values , 'unsafe_string' ) );
                                    
                                    $VisibleValues = get_field_ex( $Values , 'visible_value' );
                                    $Values        = get_field_ex( $Values , 'id' );
                              }
                              elseif( $this->Security->get_gp( $Name , 'set' ) )
                              {
                                    $Values = $this->Security->filter_http_data( "keys=$Name;filled" );
                                    $Values = $Values[ $Name ];
                                    
                                    $VisibleValues = $this->Security->filter_http_data( "keys=visible_$Name;filled" );
                                    $VisibleValues = $VisibleValues[ "visible_$Name" ];
                              }
                              
                              if( $Values !== false )
                              {                                   
                                    foreach( $Values as $k => $v )
                                    {
                                          $Template.="{multiple_input_append:selector=#$id;values=[lfb] 'value' : '$v'".
                                                " , 'visible_value' : '".$VisibleValues[ $k ]."' [rfb]}";
                                    }
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $Template.="{multiple_input_add:selector=#$id;values=[lfb] ".
                                          "'value' : '' , 'visible_value' : '' [rfb]}";
                              }
                              
                              $Str = str_replace( '{multiple_'.$EntityName."_input:$MacroParameters}" , $Template , $Str );
                              
                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( $Str );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 135 of file multiple_input.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $MacroParameters = '';
                        
                        for( ; ( $MacroParameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( 
                                                                        $Str , 'multiple_input_add' ) ) !== false ; )
                        {
                              $this->Settings->load_settings( $MacroParameters );
                              
                              $Selector = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'selector' );
                              $Template = $this->CachedMultyFS->get_template( __FILE__ , 'multiple_input_add.tpl' );
                              
                              $Template = $this->String->print_record( $Template , $this->Settings->get_raw_settings() );

                              $Str = str_replace( 
                                    "{multiple_input_add:$MacroParameters}" , $Template , $Str
                              );

                              $Changed = true;
                        }
                        
                        return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
